thread.title: Oil Prices Rise on Weak USD and Escalating Tension in Syria
thread.title_full: Oil Prices Rise on Weak USD and Escalating Tension in Syria - WSJ

author: Jenny Hsu
title: Oil Prices Rise on Weak USD and Escalating Tension in Syria
text: 0132 GMT [Dow Jones] Oil prices are nudging higher on a weak performing greenback and the growing tension in Syria which presents higher risks of disruptions in oil flow, says Stuart Ive, a client advisor at OM Financial. Dollar Index, which gauges the dollar against a basket of 16 currencies, is down 0.05% at $87.47. “Prices are also being supported by reports of possible talks between Russia and the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries to stabilize the market,” he notes, adding to chatter that OPEC countries are looking at cutting their production.
